navigableData.title: Hello World
navigableData.tldr: My name is Nick Malozzi. I'm a Denver, CO based Front End Developer with a healthy dose of design️ skills.
navigableData.verbose: I ❤️ building interfaces. With experience in Graphic, Web, & UX Design, I'm uniquely suited to work closely with Design and/or Product Teams. Read on to learn more, and don't hesitate to contact️ me.

projects.title: Instructor Dashboard
projects.description: Built the Instructor Interface for the Bluprint Video Player Library. This included a statistics section, and an interactive commenting inbox.

projects.title: Video Player Library (VPL)
projects.description: Was a core contributor to the Bluprint Video Player Library. My work included consuming and interfacing with our video player (TheoPlayer), styling the video player controls, and passing watch/play data to and from our analytics platforms.

projects.title: Video Player Experience (VPE)
projects.description: Built the Blupint Video Player Experience. Which included the consumption of the VPL mentioned above, as well as the entire user interface for Bluprint's core product. The VPE included episodic navigation, supplies and materials downloads, timestamped notes/bookmarks, and commenting. Additionally, I built user state based messaging/marketing and analytics.

projects.title: Craftsy/Bluprint Shop 2.0
projects.description: Was a core contributor to the ground-up rebuild of Craftsy. Which later became the Bluprint Shop. Initial responsibilities included designing and building the Atomic Component Library, and the SASS architecture. Said architecture supported 2 major rebranding efforts on tight timelines (that I executed). Later responsibilities included a number of new features.

projects.title: Craftsy 1.0
projects.description: Was a core contributor to the Craftsy 1.0 Platform. Responsibilities included UX/UI design, and HTML/JS.

projects.title: This Site
projects.description: This very portfolio site is designed, built, and maintained solely by yours truly.

projects.title: Old Heads That Shred
projects.description: COMING SOON: Old Heads That Shred is a joint effort with a friend of mine. I'm currently building the site to support our skateboard brand that caters to skaters who firmly believe that age is just a number.
